TABLE.NAME: deviceallocation
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the details of the device allotted to the users

FIELD.NAME: deviceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The device that has been allotted.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the user to whom the device has been allotted.

FIELD.NAME: issuedate
FIELD.COMMENT: The date on which the device was issued.

FIELD.NAME: returndate
FIELD.COMMENT: The date on which the device was returned.

TABLE.NAME: device
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the details of the device to be allotted

TABLE.NAME: deviceusage
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the details of the apps used by the user.

FIELD.NAME: macaddress
FIELD.COMMENT: The MAC address of the device that has been allotted to the user.

FIELD.NAME: application
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the app being used by the user.

FIELD.NAME: start_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The time at which the app was started or resumed.

FIELD.NAME: stop_time
FIELD.COMMENT: The time at which the app was stopped or replaced.
